title: Cannot deploy libSkiaSharp when copy libSkiaSharp from  runtimes\win10-x86\native location in SkiaSharp NuGet package into published folder.
body:
**Description**

Cannot deploy libSkiaSharp when copy libSkiaSharp from the runtimes\win10-x86\native location in SkiaSharp NuGet package into the published folder.

**Code**

- Create an asp.net core 2.0 web project (any template).
- Reference a NuGet package that has a native library, in my particular case it was SkiaSharp 1.6.0.
- Create publish profile
- In publish, profile settings change deployment mode to self-contained, and target runtime to win-x86
- Publish the project
- Copy libSkiaSharp from the runtimes\win10-x86\native location in the SkiaSharp NuGet package into the published folder.

**Expected Behavior**

It should works

**Actual Behavior**

Cannot deploy
